attributes.action: Give people the right to cash in their pension before age 55 due to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to do this, as it would immediately help boost people's finances and also help to relieve Government funds at such a difficult time for all involved.
attributes.background: With Covid 19 now having a huge impact on people's finances, I strongly believe that if a person wishes to cash in their pension early before the age of 55, in order to receive the money they are entitled to, then it would help many families & people out in a time of great uncertainty.
